sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REGARDER an ancient officer of the king’s fo-reſt, fworn to make the regard of the foreſt every year ; that is, to take a view of its limits, to inquire into all offences and defaults committed by the foreſters within the foreft, and to obſerve whether all the officers executed their reſpective duties. See Foresî-Laιυs.
